languages.text: {n}Кровь заливает лицо хладного торговца. Без сомнения, на нем останется отвратительный шрам. Сцепив зубы, Пощада выдавливает:{/n} "Я запомню эту встречу, Ваша Светлость. Обещаю".

{n}Blood pours over the Cold Trader's face. It is sure to leave a hideous scar. Clenching his teeth, Mercy grits out:{/n} "I'll remember this meeting, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I promise you that."
languages.original_text: {n}Кровь заливает лицо хладного торговца. Без сомнения, на нем останется отвратительный шрам. Сцепив зубы, Пощада выдавливает:{/n} "Я запомню эту встречу, Ваша Светлость. Обещаю".

traits.speaker: Mercy

traits.locale_text: {n}Blood pours over the Cold Trader's face. It is sure to leave a hideous scar. Clenching his teeth, Mercy grits out:{/n} "I'll remember this meeting, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I promise you that."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}悯慈脸上血流如注，这道伤口肯定会留下一道狰狞的疤痕。他咬牙切齿地开了口。{/n}“我会永远记住这次见面的，大人。我向您保证。”
languages.original_text: {n}Blood pours over the Cold Trader's face. It is sure to leave a hideous scar. Clenching his teeth, Mercy grits out:{/n} "I'll remember this meeting, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}悯慈脸上血流如注，这道伤口肯定会留下一道狰狞的疤痕。他咬牙切齿地开了口。{/n}“我会永远记住这次见面的，大人。我向您保证。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}コールド・トレーダーの顔に血が流れる。ひどい傷跡が残ることは間違いないだろう。歯を食いしばり、マーシーは呻く。{/n}「この出会いは忘れせんよ、陛下。絶対に」
languages.original_text: {n}Blood pours over the Cold Trader's face. It is sure to leave a hideous scar. Clenching his teeth, Mercy grits out:{/n} "I'll remember this meeting, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}コールド・トレーダーの顔に血が流れる。ひどい傷跡が残ることは間違いないだろう。歯を食いしばり、マーシーは呻く。{/n}「この出会いは忘れせんよ、陛下。絶対に」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}La sangre cubre la cara del Comerciante Frío. Sin duda, dejará una cicatriz espantosa. Apretando los dientes, Mercy masculla:{/n} «Recordaré este encuentro, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Se lo prometo».
languages.original_text: {n}Blood pours over the Cold Trader's face. It is sure to leave a hideous scar. Clenching his teeth, Mercy grits out:{/n} "I'll remember this meeting, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sangre cubre la cara del Comerciante Frío. Sin duda, dejará una cicatriz espantosa. Apretando los dientes, Mercy masculla:{/n} «Recordaré este encuentro, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Se lo prometo».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Un flot de sang se déverse de la plaie, qui ne manquera pas de laisser une vilaine cicatrice sur le visage du marchand. Les dents serrées, Mercy marmonne :{/n} « Je n'oublierai pas cette réunion, Votre Seigneurie. Je vous le promets. »
languages.original_text: {n}Blood pours over the Cold Trader's face. It is sure to leave a hideous scar. Clenching his teeth, Mercy grits out:{/n} "I'll remember this meeting, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un flot de sang se déverse de la plaie, qui ne manquera pas de laisser une vilaine cicatrice sur le visage du marchand. Les dents serrées, Mercy marmonne :{/n} « Je n'oublierai pas cette réunion, Votre Seigneurie. Je vous le promets. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Blut strömt übers Gesicht des Kalthändlers. Er wird mit Sicherheit eine hässliche Narbe davontragen. Mercy beißt die Zähne zusammen und schleudert dir entgegen:{/n} "Ich werde dieses Treffen nicht vergessen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Das verspreche ich Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}Blood pours over the Cold Trader's face. It is sure to leave a hideous scar. Clenching his teeth, Mercy grits out:{/n} "I'll remember this meeting, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Blut strömt übers Gesicht des Kalthändlers. Er wird mit Sicherheit eine hässliche Narbe davontragen. Mercy beißt die Zähne zusammen und schleudert dir entgegen:{/n} "Ich werde dieses Treffen nicht vergessen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Das verspreche ich Euch."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Soğuk Tacir'in yüzünden oluk oluk kan akıyor. Yarasının feci bir iz bırakacağı kesin. Merhamet, sıktığı dişlerinin arasından konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu görüşmemizi unutmayacağım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Blood pours over the Cold Trader's face. It is sure to leave a hideous scar. Clenching his teeth, Mercy grits out:{/n} "I'll remember this meeting, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soğuk Tacir'in yüzünden oluk oluk kan akıyor. Yarasının feci bir yara izi bırakacağı kesin. Merhamet, sıktığı dişlerinin arasından konuşuyor:{/n} "Bu görüşmemizi unutmayacağım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Söz veriyorum."
traits.speaker: Mercy
